scripts.phpstan: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)")/ composer run-script phpstan
scripts.lint-php: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)")/ composer run-script lint
scripts.format-php: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)")/ composer run-script format
scripts.pretest-php: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") composer install --no-dev; wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") composer dump --dev; wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") composer --working-dir=build-phpunit update --no-interaction
scripts.pretest-php-coverage: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") composer install --no-dev; wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") composer dump --dev; wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") composer --working-dir=build-phpunit update --no-interaction
scripts.test-php-coverage: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") build-phpunit/vendor/bin/phpunit -c phpunit.xml.dist --coverage-clover build/logs/php-coverage.xml
scripts.test-php-multisite-coverage: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)") build-phpunit/vendor/bin/phpunit -c tests/phpunit/multisite.xml --coverage-clover build/logs/php-coverage-multisite.xml
